title: Classic Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake layered with creamy chocolate ganache and topped with chocolate shavings.

title: Red Velvet Cupcakes
description: Moist red velvet cupcakes topped with classic cream cheese frosting and a hint of cocoa.

title: Lemon Tart
description: Zesty lemon curd in a crisp pastry shell, topped with torched meringue for the perfect balance of sweet and tart.

title: Tiramisu Cake
description: Italian-inspired tiramisu cake with layers of coffee-soaked sponge, mascarpone cream, and cocoa powder.

title: Cheesecake Slice
description: Creamy New York-style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, served with berry compote.

title: Fruit Tarts
description: Individual fruit tarts with pastry cream and fresh seasonal fruits, glazed to perfection.
